name: Bambi's Trivia
description:
PLAY ON NEWGROUNDS:

https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/824619

Bambi is back! And he's brought along some questions to test your knowledge on the FNF Dave and Bambi mod!

Some questions have 2 answers, some have 3! Use the (X), (O), and Up buttons to provide an answer to each of them! Be careful, though! You only have 3 lives, and every time you answer wrong, you lose one! Answer wrong three times, and the game will restart itself! So, make sure you have plenty of knowledge on the Dave and Bambi mod!
